articles.title: Apple overtakes Samsung as world’s top smartphone seller
articles.description: iPhone maker ends South Korean rival’s 12-year lead, as Xiaomi, Honor and Google divide Android market
articles.content:
Apple has overtaken Samsung as the world’s top smartphone seller.
The US technology company’s iPhone for the first time became the world’s biggest selling smartphone after its South Korean rival’s 12-year run as leader, data showed.
